meanings.sent1: I counted up to twelves on the clock.
meanings.sent2: There are twelves months in a year.
meanings.sent3: The baker baked twelves cookies for the party.
meanings.sent4: The twelves on the calendar marked the end of the year.
meanings.sent5: She bought twelves eggs at the store.

meanings.definition: A group or set of twelve.
meanings.sent1: She bought twelves roses for her friend's birthday.
meanings.sent2: There were twelves students in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The store sold twelves donuts for a special price.
meanings.sent4: The twelves of birds flew in perfect formation.
meanings.sent5: He collected twelves stamps for his collection.

meanings.definition: The twelfth in a set or series.
meanings.sent1: She won the race and crossed the finish line twelves.
meanings.sent2: The twelves chapter of the book revealed the mystery.
meanings.sent3: The twelves place in line got the last ticket.
meanings.sent4: The twelves day of the month was a lucky one.
meanings.sent5: He reached the twelves level in the game.
